profile:
Honesty, integrity, and Quality Workmanship

Reno~Ventions is a fully licensed and insured residential and commercial general contracting company. We have been exceeding customer expectations with every job completed for over twenty years. Our quality workmanship has earned us a reputation as one of the Regions premiere contractors for both commercial and residential projects. We specialize in complete home improvements, renovations, and remodeling. We do possess the knowledge, confidence, and experience to complete every project with 100% satisfaction to our valued clients.

Our projects have a 98% on-time completion record!

Reno ~ Ventions commitments:

5 year written warranty on our labor
On schedule completion dates
Cost-effective process from beginning to end
Final product exceeds expectations
Honesty, integrity, and great value
 Your satisfaction is our #1 priority!

profile:
We are a small renovation company that takes pride in the service we provide as well good communication with our clients we have been in business since  2007 we do all aspects of interior renovations with bathrooms being our main focus.

Brian’s Home Solutions is a privately owned renovation company, servicing Milton and surrounding areas. Established as a leader in the home improvement industry specializing in bathrooms. Owner, Brian Harvey has a real for passion for the home renovation industry. He has ten years in the housing industry, working for some of Canada’s largest and most prestigious home building groups as a contractor and project manager. We employ local accredited trades such as Electricians for there expertise and knowledge. As our client you can expect honesty, integrity, and a high standard of workmanship. Brian’s Home Solutions uses Schluter products and Canadian made products where possible.
